title: Report a Downed Tree Blocking a Road
description: A citizen reports that a large tree has fallen and is completely blocking a public road.

tasks.description: Gather the location of the downed tree.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the exact location of the road blockage.

tasks.description: Recognize the issue as a public safety hazard and escalate it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent flags the request as an emergency.

tasks.description: Create an emergency work order and dispatch a public works crew to clear the road.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent immediately dispatches a crew to the location.
